extendedInfo.description: Important: get the latest version of Bubble Ball with Community Levels and other enhancements at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.naygames.android.bubbleball-----Bubble Ball Free has 48 sweet levels for you to play! Want more after those? Get Bubble Ball Pro with lots more levels, and get all future levels for free! https://market.android.com/details?id=com.naygames.android.bubbleballpro-----Try this fun, new physics puzzle game, where you will test your ingenuity and thinking skills to get the bubble to the goal. Use the pieces and powerups provided, and come up with creative solutions! There are two types of pieces, wood and metal. Wood pieces are affected by gravity when you hit Start, while metal ones stay where you placed them. Use powerups to give the bubble speed boosts and even reverse gravity! Don't like the blue bubble? Make it a different color! Don't want to start at the beginning? You can skip around to your liking and jump right into the 48 exciting levels. A great game to test your logical thinking skills, and to play whenever you're bored!

reviews.title: Excellent game.
reviews.comment: Very nice game. Please add some extra levels....
reviews.author: Zeeshan Alam

reviews.comment: This app is awesome on my droid x.........some of the puzzles seem impossable but hang in there, they arnt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Easy to get started and very addictive. Interestingly when you replay a solution on my Nexus 7, the outcomes can vary on the more dynamic solutions. Must be some kind of timing or rounding errors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: if you run out of levels challenge yourself
reviews.comment: Great game/puzzle. it\'s funny to read the comments, half of which complain that it\'s too hard and the others complain that it\'s too easy. If you think it\'s too easy, challenge yourself to use as few pieces as possible in each level, or to get the ball to the flag as fast as possible, or as slow as possible. It does crash now and then, but it works most of the time \342\200\223 just restart when needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, but much room for improvement
reviews.comment: 1. It needs more levels--the iOS version has more, why not Android? 2. Dragging items around the screen was sometimes unresponsive on my Nexus One 3. After the bubble stops moving, or is sufficiently far off the screen, the physics simulation should automatically stop. 4. Even better than just more levels would be the ability to generate your own levels, much like a lot of the tilt maze games do. Some of the levels are more interesting than others, so let the community come up with really creative ones!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun to play
reviews.comment: Not unique, just a variation of some other physics games. Also, the game should be able to rotate in opposite directions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I really enjoyed playing this game. It challenges me & relax me.
reviews.comment: I didn\'t have any glitches on my Gtab7. The developer did a fantastic job with this one. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Short and sweet!
reviews.comment: Fun game! Finished the whole thing in about an hour. It would be nice if the back button took you to the menu rather than exiting the game. Or separate the menu button a little more from the start button.
reviews.author: Matt Stiles

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Challenging and fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This suxs 2nd level the ball wont move Atrix. N this game created by Robert Nay. Don\'t see how it could be downloaded 7 million times. or App store

reviews.comment: This game is so fun. I can\'t belive a 14 year old made this game!!! I love it so much I play it to school and when I\'m bord nice gane to play when bord

reviews.comment: Not bad. Back button closes the app with no confirmation. Really annoying. Also hard to move small objects

reviews.comment: Nice game. Not too hard, but makes you think.

reviews.comment: This app crashes my DROID 2 Global every time I open it. Lame. Uninstall!

reviews.title: Fantastic Game.
reviews.comment: One star because I want to buy it, I live in Gibraltar and Google says no.  Please, developers, think of ways around this farce of an Android Market and it\'s discrimination.  Thank You.

reviews.comment: Crashes on droid x froyo.

reviews.title: Annoying back button
reviews.comment: Has 5 star potential, but please ensure that back button returns to menu screen and not exit the game. Level editor needed.

reviews.comment: This is a really fun game.  I love it.
